section.name: Welcome to DTO Maven Plugin
section.p: DTO Maven Plugin generates DTO for Java Bean classes and avoid to write them manually.
Because it generates DTO from compiled classes. It can only generate DTO classes for Java Bean in your dependencies.
General instructions on how to use the DTO Maven Plugin can be found on the usage page.. Some more specific use cases are described in the examples given below.

ul.li: dto:help displays help information on DTO Maven Plugin.

section.p: To provide you with better understanding of some usages of the DTO Maven Plugin, you can take a look into the following examples:
